text:
-ma#~ggiraH || 
tasmai# nUq namaqBidya#vE vAqcA vi#rUpaq nitya#yA | 
vRuShNE# cOdasva suShTuqtiM || 
kamu# Shvidasyaq sEna#yAq&gnErapA#kacakShasaH | 
paqNiM gOShu# starAmahE ||
mA nO# dEqvAnAqM ~MviSa#H prasnAqtIri#vOqsrAH | 
kRuqSaM na hA#suqraGni#yAH ||
mA na#H samasya dUqDhya#H pari#dvEShasO a(gm) haqtiH | 
Uqrmirna nAvaqmA va#dhIt || 
nama#stE agnaq Oja#sE gRuqNanti# dEva kRuqShTaya#H | 
amai# - [  ]  62
